resources.string: Hey, am having great time reading books with this cool app MoBooks. I has great content I recommend you check it out on Google PlayStore

Seeking for knowledge without having a good source of information is a challenge to many people. Online resources has become one of the most source of knowledge in most parts of the world today and due to users demand for this knowledge in books, this application was developed to facilitate access to books at your comfort wherever you are anytime anywhere. The only thing you need to have is an internet connection for books in categories other than most read books. \nMoBooks application contain a variety of books arranged in different categories which make it easier for the person seeking for knowledge in books to make decisions easily on where to get which book. \nWe will try at our level best to improve the contents of books in this application as frequent as we can. We will also be listening to users requests and suggestion on books and general improvement to the application.

The long term goal of this application is to enable users to easily access books in an easy and more efficient manner. The current study show the challenges users face while searching for books and thus this application will try to provide solutions to this constrains. 
Books contained in this application are copyright free and those with copyright are included as per the permission from the book owner(s). In case of any copyright infringement for any material here in the application, we will simply remove it from the database. 
If you have your own book (which you are the author or have relevant rights to the books) and you wish it to be included in this application, then send us an email with the details indicating all relevant information and rights over the book. We will be glad to include it to the contents of this application. 
Pornographic and child abuse materials will not be allowed in this application. If you encounter a book that breaks human rights kindly write to us indicating the book title, author and a short description so that we can pull down the book. We rely on your feedback since we are not in a position to read all the content of every book before we upload for our users. 
This application does not collect users information.

This application was developed by Elly Wenani, a Software and Application Developer. This being an open source project, developers around the globe are free to contribute to the development of this application so as to improve users experience.
